description: You may designate an array of languages specifications that the package supports by default. Each element in the languages array is an object which defines the language tag, label, and path to its localization file.

lang.description: The official 2-character language code in lower-case letters, for example "en".

name.description: The formal and readable name for the language, for example "English".

path.description: Path to a JSON file relative to the system directory where language translation strings are provided.
